ABER CABRONES ME ESTABA RIFANDO MASHIN CON UNOS COLEGAS Y QUE SE ME MUEREN TODOS Y YO LE JUGUE AL LONE SURVIVOR Y QUE ME CRASHEA EN EL CLIMAX EN EL MERO CLIMAX. ESO QUE WEYYY

i think overall that the game is well worth the money, and that you will probably enjoy it. But im not going to sugar-coat it for you, it's not easy and it can be frustrating, on either survivor or killer. The devs have done pretty well so far and im sure will continue too in the future; unfortunately the game is complex and most of the time problems arent simply solved, because one way or another there is always two sides of things. this can arguably be one of the biggest issues in the game because they usually cant come to a win-win scenario. however this is not their fault, the game is naturally two-sided, and is not always fun for either side no matter how many buffs one side gets. I think due to lack of real in-game experience with real online players at a rank other than rank 20, the devs have a difficult time changing things appropriately, and with the players on both sides getting more and more advanced the devs can hardly keep up, even with all the updates. i do however  have to give the devs credit for everything they've done for dbd. no matter how much i play this game console or PC, its always changing, and always a challenge and deep down its one of my most loved games. i think the idea of dead by daylight is unlike any other and is quite original. i hope, if you've read this far anyways, that ive convinced you to at least give dbd a try and to keep an open mind about it, and definitely always remember that it is just game no matter what happens in-game, be nice to other people.
nada a declarar... apenas adimirar esse jogo bom e tiltante, recomendo q tomem uns calmantes antes de jogar, pq a hitbox, ai ai, a hitbox.

Me gusta muchisimo este juego, ya llevo 1700hs y estoy bastante conforme. Es muy divertido, podes jugar con muchos amigos, conocer gente nueva, la comunidad es amigable aunque a veces toxica. Pero dentro de todo si jugar en equipos siempre la pasaras bien y echaras unas risas. Prueben lo y no se arrepentiran nwn

This game is easy to learn, but hard to master. Playing for the first time it won't take long for you to learn the mechanics whether your survivor, or killer. There is a lot of minor mechanics that make big differences in the higher ranks and many perks for you to get. I am a killer main, but I found it to be a little easier to get survivors leveled up for their perks since I had no new play-style to learn, or low-tier characters. Overall though its a fun game; Easy to learn mechanics, perks to collect by playing different characters, and rewarding game play.

I've played this game since release off and on. I have around ~500 hours in this game, and can honestly say it feels like punishment whenever I play it. This game feels like a game I should play when I'm angry at another game, because nothing can compare to how trash this game is, and I think that's saying something. Bugs and balancing issues since release. The developers don't seem to care about their players, just the money they can make from it. Their BEST update since release was cosmetics, if you can even say that was a "good" update. Greedy devs who only cared to cash out on a game that was already becoming horrendously trash instead of fixing the root of their issues. Oh, then they tried to make another game and failed at that one too! Really says a lot. :) The only reason players who have thousands of hours in this game still play is because games that are supposed to be like this are WORST and we have to deal with garbage. 1/10, solely because I play this game when I want to bang my head on my wall.

Edit: 5/26/2021

Right now I'am at 126 hours legit. I've been playing this game for quite long now, still cant say I'am a veteran but close I guess. They outdone it again with the latest chapter Resident Evil. Another Fav game! Jill and Leon vs Nemesis. i can't say enough that this game is getting better! And more fun! Don't be afraid to try if you are new player. You are expected to die alot. Fun is what matter, just keep playing.

---------------------------------------

13 Hours...but don't be fool by that, because I was too lazy to leave the game even while AFK.
Anyway, I'am a noob/newbies. I prob only play this game around 4 to 5 hours or maybe less..because as a new player or newbie player, this game is really hard to play. It's a fun game never the less and something I really want to spend more time in, especially with their new DLC Silent Hill <3.

I came back to this game because of the Silent Hill chapter. Hard fans of Silent Hill game, and I'am so happy to see one of my fav character in DBD. As a newbie player, I have lots of missing perks from all the DLC i have not purchase. Idk If I could get those perks from other survivors without having to buy those dlc or it's something I must buy. From what I watched on youtube, there are specific Perks that must be require as a new player, and those perk some belong with the dlc character, and yes I only play as survivor. 

Is the game friendly with new players? well..Kinda imo. Many vet players mention that you will die alot as survivor newbie and that is to be expected in this game. You can't win all the time and you will die most of the time as survivors. Other say newbies should play as a Killer, but I hate playing as a killer. I'am glad that this game have no voice chat or else I prob would have hear vet complaining how noob die so fast with their toxic breath. 

If you decide to play DBD, expect that you will die alot as survivor. It's not something to be afraid of. Don't be scared of dying, if you bother by the thought that you just a burden to other player, just don't. Don't give a dam of other player think of you. Just play to have fun. Competitive player would have play with their own set team mates instead with some random players. So just go and have fun.
um dos melhores jogos da steam

Dead by Daylight is everything you want in a horror genre game. 
I would call it the Smash Bros of horror survival, ALMOST everyone is here from Micheal Myers to Ghostface. 
Whether you are playing as a killer or a survivor, DBD provides unique gameplay on either side of the coin. 

DBD sometimes struggles with balancing issues but they are consistently update and reworking what doesn't work. This game is a labour of love to the horror genre and it shows. If you are a horror fan this game is for you.
Fun game to play with friends :)
best thing about this game are its developers
Very fun coop game.  Recent update added cross-play with console players and much better graphics.
